item.title: Numerical Analysis
item.description: Numerical Analysis is a branch of mathematics that deals with the approximation of solutions to mathematical problems. It involves methods and algorithms for solving equations, systems of linear or nonlinear equations, interpolation, differentiation, integration, optimization problems, and other mathematical problems. Numerical analysis is used in various fields such as engineering
